inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: You cannot use the Tactical Map because you have Battle Realism enabled.

active.name: active
active.tooltip: Auto-triggering enabled||Right-click on this button to toggle auto-triggering of this ability for the selected unit.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: Auto-triggering disabled||Right-click on this button to toggle auto-triggering of this ability for the selected unit.

active.name: active
active.tooltip: Auto-triggering enabled||Right click on this button to toggle auto-triggering of this ability for the selected unit.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: Auto-triggering disabled||Right click on this button to toggle auto-triggering of this ability for the selected unit.

active.name: active
active.tooltip: Auto-triggering enabled||Right click on this button to toggle auto-triggering of this ability for the selected unit.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: Auto-triggering disabled||Right click on this button to toggle auto-triggering of this ability for the selected unit.

button_army_upgrade_options_upgrades.componentleveltooltip: Army Ability Upgrades||Use [[img:forbidden_knowledge]][[/img]]Forbidden Knowledge to upgrade your army abilities into stronger ones for the duration of the battle.

localised_text.tooltip_text: Await the arrival of the enemy's reinforcements and continue the battle
Abandon the field before the enemy's reinforcements arrive. Your army will be victorious but the enemy reinforcements will be unaffected.

button_gift_unit.componentleveltooltip: Gift units||Give control of the selected units to a spectator. The spectator can return units.

localised_text.tooltip_text: Group||Combines the selected units into a group. This allows you to issue orders to the whole group rather each individual unit.
Toggle guard mode||Units ordered into guard mode will hold their position and will not pursue disengaged targets.
Halt||Cancels the selected units' movement and attack orders. It also disables fire-at-will.
Toggle melee mode||When melee mode is on, issuing an attack order will send the selected units to engage the target in hand-to-hand combat.
Toggle unit speed||Units ordered to move quickly will tire faster than when moving at normal speed.
Toggle flying||When turned off, flying units will land and stay on the ground.
Set formation||Moves the selected units into a formation, which allows you to quickly prepare for battle or switch tactic.

button_toggle_overcharge.componentleveltooltip: Toggle Overcast||Toggle whether spells should be overcast by default

button_upgrade_options_buffs.componentleveltooltip: Replenishments||Use the supply battle currency to replenish your battleworn units throughout the battle.

button_upgrade_options_upgrades.componentleveltooltip: Upgrades||Use the supply battle currency to upgrade your units equipment for the duration of the battle.

button_withdraw_tooltip.componentleveltooltip: Teleport Withdraw||Units withdrawn in this way will teleport out of the battle to replenish if clear of any danger. These units will appear in the reinforcement pool.

default.name: default
default.tooltip: Withdraw||Order the selected units to retreat, which will make them run off the map. If any escape, they will survive and can be reused in another battle.

teleport.name: teleport
teleport.tooltip: Teleport Withdraw||Units withdrawn in this way will teleport out of the battle to replenish if clear of any danger. These units will appear in the reinforcement pool.

teleport_changeling.name: teleport_changeling
teleport_changeling.tooltip: Teleport Withdraw||Units withdrawn in this way will teleport out of the battle to replenish if clear of any danger. These units will appear in the reinforcement pool. [[col:red]] Cannot teleport withdraw while the Changeling is transformed [[/col]]

trial.name: trial
trial.tooltip: Deal damage to enemies to fill the bar.

component_text.text: Drain Magic – the Winds evade you.
You have started with the maximum Winds of Magic!
Risk magic for more favourable winds!
Total Power – you have channelled the Winds of Magic!
Other players can assign units for you to control via the Gift Unit button

available.name: available
available.tooltip: Summon Reinforcements||Use the supply battle currency to bring reinforcement units in to the battlefield. Withdrawn or defeated units will reappear in this pool.

passive_partipant.name: passive_partipant
passive_partipant.tooltip: Cannot purchase reinforcements as a passive participant

spinning_dial.comment: BattleStormOfMagicSpinningDial callback handles triggering of animations and switching from loop anim to final anim once transition battle side has finished and ensure rotates right amount to land on correct segment

spread_parent.comment: Shows when have a spread range

storm_dial_frame.comment: Used for storms of magic, shows whenever ascendancy change and initial during battle deployment (that is handled by OnCreate anim on here). Initially shown in middle, then transitions down to bottom right for future appearances. Hide animation has a conditional branch in first thing, so if first time run it will actually call the transition animation instead based on if first animation, branch dependant on a user property that gets set by hide_first_time animation. The text_holder child calls our hide animation once its aniomation is finished and our hide animation does the branch.

storm_dial_holder.comment: Non resizing parent for storm dial so that when change res it doesnt resize and break the storm dial which needs to be resizable due to its transition animation. It resizes to screen so dial worksbut is initially set to non resizable so as not to get resized by resolution changes them selves so those changes dont propagate down to dial frame

template_segment.comment: Rotates segment based on child index, 8 segments so each one rotated 45 degrees. Sets state to flashing if current ascendancy and the spinner isnt currently spinning, listens for animation starting and ending so can correctly flash at end of anim (this event sent by spinning_dial animation, and thats the guid we check too)

callback_with_context.context_function_id: self | self.ChildIndex == 1 => self.SetProperty("threshold", GameCoreContext.TrialManager.TrialBronzeMedalScore) | self.ChildIndex == 2 => self.SetProperty("threshold", GameCoreContext.TrialManager.TrialSilverMedalScore) | self.ChildIndex == 3 => self.SetProperty("threshold", GameCoreContext.TrialManager.TrialGoldMedalScore) | self.SetProperty("threshold", GameCoreContext.TrialManager.TrialPlatinumMedalScore)

under_menu_bar_list_parent.comment: This is parent for player lists and telestration and objectives components so that they stack nicely
